## Tree.rangeToIndex() method

`rangeToIndex` returns the integer offsets of the given range.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rangeToIndex(range: TreeRange): [
        number,
        number
    ];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  range | TreeRange |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[ number, number \]
